page.title: 08TRANSPORT
page.content: NORMALLY BUSES PASS THROUGH PATTERDALE AND GLENRIDDING AS WELL AS THE MOUNTAIN GOAT MINI BUS SERVICE. THERE ARE LOTS OF LAND ROVERS AS WELL. THE BUSES NORMALLY GO TO PENRITH. WE HAVE A LOT OF HOLIDAY COACHES COMING TO THE HOTELS AS WELL. THE MOUNTAIN GOAT IS A SMALL BUSINESS COMPANY .IT IS CALLED THE MOUTAIN GOAT BECAUSE A GOAT GOES UP MOUTAIN LIKE THE BUS. IN BIKES THERE ARE LOTS OF RACERS AND BMX'S. DOWN AT THE LAKE THERE ARE SOME STEAMERSAS AS WELL. THERE ARE TWO STEAMERS.THEY ARE CALLED THE RAVEN AND THE LADY OF THE LAKE.THEY GET A GOOD PROFIT IN SUMMER AND CLOSE DOWN IN WINTER . THERE ARE LOTS OF VANS AROUND AS WELL. THERE ARE LOTS OF COACHES THAT PASS THROUGH THE DALE .AT EVERY BUS STAION THERE ARE NOTICE BOARD TIME TABLES. THESE ARE USEFUL TO TELL WHEN BUSES ARE AVAILABLE.
